participant_1.background:
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
i am also round.
i just moved into an apartment within the vicinity of my new job.
I have gray hair but I still love to read to my grandchildren.
I have an odd schedule since I'm a night owl, but I still get my work done.

i do the shopping in my house.
the idea of working is not my cup of tea.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.
i am hoping to play basketball overseas.

content.text: Hi there! I am new in town and looking to make some friends.
Hello! I am also new in town and looking to make some friends too.
That is great! What are your hobbies?
I love to play basketball and I am also hoping to play basketball overseas.
That is awesome! I love to play basketball too, but I am not very good at it.
That's okay! We can practice together and get better together.
That sounds like a great idea!
What do you do for a living?
I am a night owl, so I usually work odd hours.
I do not work, I am a stay-at-home mom.
That must be nice! I wish I could stay at home all day.
It does have its perks, but it can also be very boring.
I can imagine.
So, where do you live?
I live in the suburbs, it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
That sounds nice! I would love to live in the suburbs.
It is nice, but it can be boring sometimes.
I can imagine.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and play basketball.
That sounds like fun! I like to read, watch movies, and play basketball too.
That's great! We have a lot in common.
